content.text: An Inventory Shortages Report provides a quick review of which parts need to be ordered. This guide will demonstrate how to generate an Inventory Shortages Report.
Navigate to Reports > Inventory > Inventory Shortages.
Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field
Select which warehouse to populate the shortages report for
Use this field to generate inventory shortages per vendor

Navigate to Reports > Inventory > Inventory Valuation.
Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field
